summary: My personally used Nightingale texture in blue.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is dependant on:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1560]Capeless nightingale[/url]
 
 I assume no responsiblity for the removal of the cape or any mesh work,Gilead Maerlyn did that work I just changed the texture of the visible armor. 

Installation
Simply extract the Data folder in the Skyrim folder (typically C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)

Currently Male only depending on how well this is recieved will depend on the female mod.
author: Conejito
